description: The Details of the Contract are as follows:
full_summary:
Competitive Procurement Notice: L-Shaped Height Adjustable Tables
===========================================================

**Public Tender Details**
------------------------

*   **Procurement Number:** WS4283096607
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4283096607
*   **Publication Date:** November 28, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023 at 14:00 hours (Eastern Standard Time)
*   **Amendment Number:** 3 (Revision includes a revised tender closing date)
*   **Purchase and Delivery Location:** Ottawa, Ontario

**Notice Type**
----------------

This notice announces a competitive procurement for the purchase and delivery of L-Shaped Electric Height Adjustable Tables by Natural Resources Canada. The required tables must be delivered and installed at the designated location in Ottawa by March 22, 2024.

**Tender Specifications**
-------------------------

The tender includes the following UNSPSC classifications:

*   56101703.00: Desks
*   56101717.00: Table Risers
*   56111802.00: Freestanding Tables
*   56112204.00: Work Surfaces

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers and is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Tender Status**
-----------------

This tender has expired and is no longer open for submission.

**Supplier Contact**
-------------------

For more information or to request a copy of the tender documents, suppliers should contact:

Christopher Finnigan
Public Services and Procurement Canada
christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
----------------

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18132124?extsite=MTgxMzIxMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18132124?extsite=MTgxMzIxMjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
